nodes.text: The Lipsec system was a star system located within the Koradin sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. The system was situated at the endpoint of the Lipsec Run hyperlane, which connected it to the Virgillia system.

The area of space surrounding the Lipsec system was explored between the years 1000 and 25 BBY. During the early phase of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, the Nineteenth Sector Army of the Galactic Republic was charged with the defense of the system's vicinity against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The population of the Lipsec system around the year 25 ABY was between 1 million to 10 million.
The Lipsec system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square I-18.
